heading: Serbian language.
general-note: Here are entered works on the language of the Serbs treated as a separate language. Works on the language(s) of the Croats or Bosnians treated as separate languages are entered under. Croatian language. or. Bosnian language.. Works on the language(s) of the Serbs, Croats, and Bosnians treated together as a single language are entered under. Serbo-Croatian language..
